actions.text: On agreeing to the Putnam amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Putnam.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Putnam amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment directs the GAO to conduct a study to determine the effects the enactment of H.R. 3915 will have on the availability and affordability of credit for homebuyers and mortgage lending, and to submit a report to Congress containing the findings and conclusions within one year of the enactment of the legislation.
purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 110-450 to direct the GAO to conduct a study to determine the effects the enactment of H.R. 3915 will have on the availability and affordability of credit for homebuyers and mortgage lending, and to submit a report to Congress containing the findings and conclusions within one year of the enactment of the legislation.
